itemtype.description: The bonus entities are bonuses obtained upon the purchase of an offer additionally to the actual subscription.
Additionally to the purchased subscription the customer gets another product as bonus.
LWL purchases, where the canvasser gets some money when somebody buys a subscription.
When buying a subscription the customer gets miles to his Miles and More account.

attribute.description: The ID that will be used by the Service Bus interface to identify payment types
PaymentType corresponds to PaymentMode in payment extensions

itemtype.description: The ProductType entity defines a product type including various settings and options that define how products of this type are handled in shop.

attribute.description: Unique ID of the product type
List of payment types with which a product of this type can be paid
Enumeration value which indicates if an invoice should be sent for purchase of this product.
The "Product group" value delivered by SAP adapter for a more detailed classification of products
The "Product class" value delivered by SAP adapter for a more detailed classification of products
The "Product cluster" value delivered by SAP adapter for a more detailed classification of products
ID
Displayed name
value

itemtype.description: Extending the Product type from core with additional attributes.

attribute.description: Unique offer ID in the external system.
Unique offer ID in the external system.
Indicates which external system is the owner of this product.
Indicates which external system is the owner of this product.
Indicates what type of fulfillment is needed for the product purchase
Indicates if the product may be sold.
Type of product from the perspective of 6 product types defined in the functional specification
Indicates if the product is digital.
Indicates if the product is dummy.
If this option is TRUE, the product may be sold only through "Prepayment" payment method.
Indicates if invoice recipient different from the customer is allowed.
Indicates if a different shipping address is allowed
Product's value added tax.
Stores the information from which interface the product were imported

itemtype.description: This entity is provided by Hybris subscription module. It extends the standard "Product" type with subscription-specific fields, i.e. information about periodicity, duration and extension options.

attribute.description: The offer is a student subscription.
It means "Readers canvass readers" (referral) offer.
It means regular customer offer, when the buyer must be a purchaser of an existing order.
It means regular customer offer, when the buyer must be an invoice recipient of an existing order.
It means regular customer offer, when the buyer must be a product recipient of an existing order.
Through this field payment methods allowed at the product type level can be overwritten, in order to restrict them for separate products.
Through this attribute additional bonuses can be added to an offer. Buyers (e.g. upon RCR offer of the canvasser) additionally obtains theses bonuses when buying a subscription.
If trial subscription offer is meant, which is automatically extended if not canceled, then this field contains the terms for the subsequent subscription.
mandatory for customer to provide address information
mandatory for customer to provide phone number
mandatory for customer to provide mobile phone number
mandatory for customer to provide email address
It is mandatory for the customer to give his opt-in to being contacted with advertising
The price communicated to customer.
Can be used to communicate the advantages of this payment plans to customer, e.g. 5% discount for yearly payment method".
The payment periodicity communicated to customer.
A flag that indicates the customer wants an invoice
A flag that indicates the customer wants to to enter an additional address for that
A flag that indicates the customer wants to use a different billing-address
List of payment types with which a product of this type can be paid
A list of terms which was accepted or not by a Customer (only the latest versions of each TermType).
Flag that indicates the user selected the product is prepay only
Address line3 is a dynamic attribute that is stored in the Address.addressSuffix field

itemtype.description: Phone numbers for address.
Extending Customer type with additional attributes.

attribute.description: First Name
Last Name
Existing subscription Id
Date when the customer will be graduated
A list of terms which was accepted or not by a Customer (only the latest versions of each TermType).
A customer email which comes from SSO. This value is also used in contactEmail field.

itemtype.description: Business partner identifier. This one used as the collection of business partner Ids attached to the Customer object.
Stores the information about TermVersions which were accepted by customer.

This is a storage of different versions of terms which comes from SSO. Some of this terms could be proposed to accept by customer in case of some circumstances. The information about the accepted terms is stored in the Customer.termsAccepted list attribute.

attribute.description: The termsVersionId is the unique identifier of each term version.

itemtype.description: A store-specific fee applied to the cart when a specific payment method is used

attribute.description: Number that indicates priority of PaymentMode

itemtype.description: Extending Website type with additional attributes.

attribute.description: email address for email fulfillment
For the subscription products user could specify the date when the subscription should start. The delivery start date should be greater or equal to the current date + this value in days.
For the subscription products user could specify the date when the subscription should start. The delivery start date should be less or equal to the current date + this value in days.
Redirect URL.
Text for the redirect url.
